level.heading: Short title.
level.text: This subtitle shall be known and may be cited as Uniform Commercial Code.

level.heading: UNIFORM COMMERCIAL CODE COMMENT
level.text: Each Article of the Code (except this Article and Article 10) may also be cited by its own short title. See Sections 2-101, 3-101, 4-101, 5-101, 6-101, 7-101, 8-101 and 9-101.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Section 39(a) of D.C. Law 15-354 provides that Title 28 is designated Title 28 of the District of Columbia Official Code.
